languages.text: Эти люди когда-то были закопаны в песок по шею. Судя по агонии, навеки застывшей на их искаженных лицах, кто-то провел здесь чрезвычайно жестокую казнь.
These people were buried up to their necks in the sand. The agony that is forever imprinted on their twisted faces shows this was a harsh execution.
languages.original_text: Эти люди когда-то были закопаны в песок по шею. Судя по агонии, навеки застывшей на их искаженных лицах, кто-то провел здесь чрезвычайно жестокую казнь.

traits.locale_text: These people were buried up to their necks in the sand. The agony that is forever imprinted on their twisted faces suggests that this was a harsh execution.

These people were buried up to their necks in the sand. The agony that is forever imprinted on their twisted faces shows this was a harsh execution.

languages.text: Esta gente fue enterrada hasta el cuello en la arena. La agonía reflejada para siempre en sus rostros retorcidos demuestra la crueldad de su ejecución.
languages.original_text: These people were buried up to their necks in the sand. The agony that is forever imprinted on their twisted faces shows this was a harsh execution.

traits.locale_text: Esta gente fue enterrada hasta el cuello en la arena. La agonía reflejada para siempre en sus rostros retorcidos demuestra la crueldad de su ejecución.

languages.text: 这些人被埋在沙子里，只有头露在外面。痛苦凝结在他们的僵硬的脸上，表明他们遭到了残忍的处决。
languages.original_text: These people were buried up to their necks in the sand. The agony that is forever imprinted on their twisted faces shows this was a harsh execution.

traits.locale_text: 这些人被埋在沙子里，只有头露在外面。痛苦凝结在他们的僵硬的脸上，表明他们遭到了残忍的处决。

languages.text: ここの人々は首まで砂に埋められた。歪んだ顔に永遠に刻まれた苦痛は、この処刑がひどいものだったことを示している。
languages.original_text: These people were buried up to their necks in the sand. The agony that is forever imprinted on their twisted faces shows this was a harsh execution.

traits.locale_text: ここの人々は首まで砂に埋められた。歪んだ顔に永遠に刻まれた苦痛は、この処刑がひどいものだったことを示している。

languages.text: Diese Leute wurden bis zum Hals im Sand vergraben. Der in ihre Gesichter eingebrannte Schmerz zeigt, dass sie grausam hingerichtet wurden.
languages.original_text: These people were buried up to their necks in the sand. The agony that is forever imprinted on their twisted faces shows this was a harsh execution.

traits.locale_text: Diese Leute wurden bis zum Hals im Sand vergraben. Der in ihre Gesichter eingebrannte Schmerz zeigt, dass sie grausam hingerichtet wurden.

languages.text: Ces gens ont été enfouis dans le sable jusqu'au cou. L'agonie gravée à jamais sur leurs visages déformés témoigne de la sévérité d'une telle exécution.
languages.original_text: These people were buried up to their necks in the sand. The agony that is forever imprinted on their twisted faces shows this was a harsh execution.

traits.locale_text: Ces gens ont été enfouis dans le sable jusqu'au cou. L'agonie gravée à jamais sur leurs visages déformés témoigne de la sévérité d'une telle exécution.

languages.text: Bu insanlar boğazlarına kadar kuma gömülmüş. Çarpık suratlarına sonsuza dek kazınan acı, bunun sert bir infaz olduğunu gösteriyor.
languages.original_text: These people were buried up to their necks in the sand. The agony that is forever imprinted on their twisted faces shows this was a harsh execution.

traits.locale_text: Bu insanlar boğazlarına kadar kuma gömülmüş. Çarpık suratlarına sonsuza dek kazınan acı, bunun sert bir infaz olduğunu gösteriyor.
